mapper.select: SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME, MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' AND STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ( 'STATUS', 'SEX', 'WORK_STATUS', 'DEPARTMENT' ) ORDER BY MACRO_NO;

SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('CUSTORMER_PROPERTY','EDUCATION_DEGREE','ACCOUNT_BANK','CUSTOMER_TYPE','SUPERIOR_COMPANY','USER_STATUS','SEX','HOME_STYLE') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('BRAND','DATA_LEVEL','YES_NO') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('BRAND','COOPERATION_MODEL','DISCOUNT_RATE_METHOD') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;

SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('SUPERIOR_COMPANY','CUSTORMER_PROPERTY','MARKET_NEW_PIPELINE_STATUS','BRAND') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;

SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('BRAND','COOPERATION_MODEL','MARKET_LEVEL','YES_NO','DISCOUNT_RATE_METHOD') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;

SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('FAÃ‡ADE_ENTRANCE','SHOW_WINDOW','SMALLPOX','STAIRS','PROP','AIR_CONDITIONER','CASHIER','LIFT','ESCALATOR','WAREHOUSE','TOILET','WHETHER_NEED','SHOP_DOOR_FORM','YES_NO','UN_FETCH_REASON') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('UN_FETCH_REASON','YES_NO') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('DEV_SHEDULE_JOIN') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('BRAND','OPERATION_MODE','STORE_PROPERTY','CHANNEL_TYPE') ORDER BY MACRO_NO ;

SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('OPERATION_MODE','BRAND','CHANNEL_TYPE','STORE_IMAGE','STORE_PROPERTY','COOPERATION_MODEL','CN_SITENAME','SEX','YES_NO','JOIN_SF_PIPELINE','DEL_FLAG') ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('STORE_PROPERTY','ASSESSMENT_INDEX','DEL_FLAG') ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('BRAND','CALCULATION_MODEL_TYPE','STATUS') ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('COOPERATE_WILLINGNESS','DEL_FLAG') ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('ASSESSMENT_INDEX','DEL_FLAG') ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE ='BRAND' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS ='M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE ='AUDIT_STATUS' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;

SELECT M.MACRO_CODE rowId, M.MACRO_NAME tagName, 'M0000' parentId FROM t_code_macro_define M WHERE MACRO_TYPE = 'BRAND' UNION ALL SELECT B.ROW_ID, B.BRANCHES_NAME_CN, B.BRAND FROM T_SYS_BRANCH_OFFICE B LEFT JOIN t_code_macro_define M ON MACRO_TYPE = 'BRAND' AND B.BRAND = M.MACRO_CODE AND M.DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' AND B.DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' UNION ALL SELECT C.CUSTOMER_ID, C.CORPORATION, B.ROW_ID FROM T_CS_CUSTOMER_OFFICE_MAPPING M INNER JOIN T_CS_CUSTOMERINFO C ON M.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID AND C.DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' INNER JOIN T_SYS_BRANCH_OFFICE B ON M.OFFICE_ID = B.ROW_ID AND B.DEL_FLAG = 'M0015'
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME, MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE MACRO_TYPE = 'STATUS' AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME, MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE MACRO_TYPE = 'SEX' AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME, MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE MACRO_TYPE = 'YES_NO' AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME, MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE MACRO_TYPE = 'STORE_TAX_RATE' AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE, MACRO_NAME, MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043'AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('YES_NO','FLOOR_TYPE') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;

SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('YES_NO','BUSINESS_TYPE','PRIORITY','MATURITY','INCOME_LEVEL','IDEAL','SITE_LOCATION','OPERATE_TYPE','VISIBILITY','SIGNATURE_EFFECTIVENESS','FLOOR_TYPE') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('CALCULATION_MODEL_TYPE') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('CHANNEL_TYPE') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('RENT_MODE') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('RENT_MODE','YES_NO') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;

SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('RENT_MODE','RENT_TYPE','RENTAL_SETTLMENT','HAVE_NOT','YES_NO','CONTRACT_MODE','EVALUATION','WHETHER_AGREE','WHETHER_CONTAIN') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;

SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('YES_NO','IDEAL','TRADEZONE_TYPE','HOUSEHOLD_INCOME_LEVEL','OFFICE_WORKER_SITUATION','STUDENT_SITUATION','RETAIL_ACTIVITY_INTENSITY','PRIORITY','MATURITY','VISIBILITY','INCOME_LEVEL','CAN_APPROACH','PROPERTY_SCORE','KEY_WORD','INVESTMENT_TYPE','NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_ZONE','SHOPPING_LEVEL') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;

SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('INCOME_MODE','PROPERTY_FORM','STRUCTURE_TYPE','IS_BASEMENT','YES_NO','DRAWING_SIZE','OUTER_WALL','INTERIOR_WALL','GROUND','CEILING','EQUIPMENT_DEAL','MATERIAL','ROOM_STORE_BACK','WATER_QUANTITY','WATER_PRESSURE','WATER_PIPE_DIAMETER','TOLIET_MGR','TOLIET_OPEN_HOURS','SUMMER_OUTDOOR_TEMP','WINTER_OUTDOOR_TEMP','AIR_CONDITION_SUPPLY','AIR_CONDITION_MODE','EFFECT','SIGN_FIRM','SIGN_VISIBILITY_LEFT_RIGHT','INDEPENDENT_INDEX_SIGN','STORE_IMAGE','HAVE_NOT','STRUCTURE_IMPROVEMENT','CABLE_LAYING') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
SELECT MACRO_CODE,MACRO_NAME,MACRO_TYPE FROM T_CODE_MACRO_DEFINE WHERE STATUS = 'M0043' AND MACRO_TYPE IN ('YES_NO','UN_FETCH_REASON') AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' ORDER BY MACRO_NO;
